fields.name: graphic
fields.description: Graphic to display on top of actor

fields.name: duration
fields.description: Duration - how long this effect lasts for, in s

fields.name: tracking
fields.description: Tracking - does this event follow the target around?

fields.name: z
fields.description: Z type - does this event appear above or below hero?

fields.name: key
fields.description: The key of this object used in code -- don't change these!

fields.name: subfolder
fields.description: Used to subcategorize objects ("/bosses" or "/areas/towns" for instance)

fields.name: name
fields.description: The display name of this object, used only by humans like you

fields.name: description
fields.description: Notes and whatnot on this object
